i am actally pretty pissed at this, just spent 12hrs downloading this crap and have been avoiding all new channels so I don't get a spoiler, the simple truth is that this video was not or anywhere near as described.............no excuse

SPfinx YOU tryt reading the description. Nowhere in there it says it is in Finish. And by adding HDTV to the title, you're clearly deceiving us into thinking this is a good quality rip, when you know very well the quality is shit. It is NOT hd. Not sure what kind of tv you guys have in Finland but HDTV is widescreen. The other kicker is that BBC does broadcast in HD so for you to rip their broadcast into crappy non hd 6:4 and then claim it's HD is just lame. And deceiving. 

To make matters worse, one assumes that a huge 4.5gig file would be superbly crisp and thus worthy of a lengthy download. Imagine our surprise to find a really crude, poor quality video that is unwatchable and not even in english.

Do us all a favor: either mention in the damn title that this is in Finish, do not deceive us by adding HD to the title and furthermore, drop dead.

Please put "Finnish" in the torrent title next time. Remember there's a download torrent link in the search results, so lots of people (myself included) will download it without ever seeing this page.
